name: LudumDare47
description:
Dead enemies turn to stone when you leave the room. Attempt to kill them in a fashion, so as to not block your own eventual path.

Use WASD to move, SPACE to shoot, and P/esc to pause.

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam, which had the theme "Stuck in a loop." 

We only got to work on it for 36 hours, from Sunday midday, due to life stuff, but we're happy with what we learned.
